Model

类 TextAreaOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • Model.TextAreaOutputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TextAreaOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    Used to wrapper a window. This is utilized in order to allow easy printing of messages on the Risk GUI.
    作者:
    yaomeng
